definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swallow, swallow down (Syr. la9, lo9 lap or lick up Ju Jdg 7:5-7);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[וְלָע֫וּ]] consec. Ob:Ob 16 (Ges:§ 67 R. 12);—abs., fig. of nations drinking (cup of judgment).—Hi De talk wildly, vid.

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: [[לוע]]; We Now [[נׇעוּ]] reel, totter (cf. Is 24:20, Is 29:9).
